page.title: 13INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: There are lots of{interesting people in Fenstanton.We have interviewed {Mr Spelman,Mr Dady and Mr Bond. {Jack Dady}is a{local historian. He is 73 and has lived in Fenstanton for 60 years,though has had contacts there all his life.He collects stamps and helps{update footpaths.}Over the last few years he has published work in the{local magazine Spectrum.}He lives at"Ye Olde Croft,Church Lane, Fenstanton. {Gerard Spelman }is a{newspaper man. He works for{Cambridge Evening News. He has worked in the newspaper business for over 22 years and has worked with a lot of newspapers. He lives at 22,Oaklands,Fenstanton. {Jack Bond }left Fenstanton School at 12.He started work on a farm milking cows.Then he started{cow driving.}He has walked as far as Peterborough.
